ComicInfo.Summary:
The Anatomy of Hate: Cort Roberts tried to control his family until his son became a seething mass of hatred.
Born Under an Evil Star: Owen Rogg kills his friend John Turner and takes his place on an expedition.
Blind As the Night!: Henry Jessup is a millionaire who would pay anything to see again.
ComicInfo.Writer: Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Murray Boltinoff,Bill Dennehy,Carl Wessler,George Kashdan,Bill Dennehy
